resources.string: Most extra features added into Syberia Project
Battery options and status bar icons to disable
Settings that are not included in other sections
Customize your AOSP or Smartbar navigation panel
Basic system settings of your device
Press on color below to apply
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on current screen brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
View or change power menu entries
Haptic feedback on action instead on press
Double tap power to toggle torch (will add a small delay to single tap)
Long press power to toggle torch
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put phone to sleep
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Enable the ability to show and use the power menu dialog while on the lockscreen
Customize various features for notification panel
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
When wired headset is plugged in
When BT headset (no carkit) is plugged in
When BT headset is plugged in
When wired or BT headset (no carkit) is plugged in
When wired or BT headset is plugged in
Answer the call when volume keys pressed
Answer the incoming call when Home button pressed
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Show visualizer on lockscreen when music is playing
Use a preset color instead of the generated color
This is test for selected toast animation
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Configure statusbar clock and date appearance
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy

Navigation bar must be disabled!

Available gestures:

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Last app
- Short swipe up and hold in the center
Height from bottom to trigger swipe
Timeout before the gesture action is started
Information about the team and maintainers
Show weather information on lockscreen and during doze
Setup icon pack and weather service
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
Show name of current city on left of image
Show current city temperature on right of image
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Allow swiping across right or left on navbar to enable
Apply a custom icon pack for Recents panel
Display 4G icon instead of LTE icon
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Show the clock widget on the lockscreen
Show the date, alarms and zen on the lockscreen
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Enable the running services icon in the footer
Enable the tile edit icon in the footer
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Disables quick settings on secure lockscreen
Location where the Pie will be placed
Swipe from bottom to trigger Home gesture. Keep it pressed to open recents. Swipe from left or right to go back.
Delay until long press action starts
Trigger back gesture on landscape from
Back gesture must start below this percentage of the screen
Show animated feedback on edges when back gesture is used
Choose an image to be displayed at the top of the notification panel
For better visibility on bright images
Click on any image to use for static mode
Select an image to use for static mode
Leave the below values as is if you don\'t understand what they mean.
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Show heads up only for dialer or messaging app if they are not in foreground
Allow to customize Gaming Mode options
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will automatically be turned on for the selected apps.
Block all headsup messages except calls.
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on.
Disable gesture navigation when Gaming mode is turned on.
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on.
Whenever you open any app and the system finds it to be a game, it will be added in gaming list automatically. Please note that this does not work for every game app.
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Additional settings for power saving and personal data protection
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
